content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'm actually planning to try out some of the local coffee shops while I'm in Sydney. Speaking of coffee, I met a barista a few weeks ago at a coffee shop near my place, and we ended up talking about our shared love for coffee and experimenting with different brewing methods at home. She recommended a few coffee shops in the area that I should try out. Do you have any recommendations for must-visit coffee shops in Sydney?
